metadata.description: Cross-platform offline-first mobile/desktop app for construction inspectors
metadata.session_notes: Session 354: Regenerated all 14 fixtures + 278 diagnostic images. Stage trace: 20/20 pass. Pipeline: 27 items, 26/131 GT matches (20%), quality 0.615. Row classifier is #1 blocker (83/90 unknown).

active_blockers.title: Cell-cropped OCR produces garbage on grid pages — 0/131 ground truth matches
active_blockers.notes: Row-strip OCR + synthetic regions + grid-aware columns implemented. Diagnostic capture working. Now: row classifier classifies 83/90 rows as 'unknown' (only 4 data). OCR has grid line contamination (|, [, ©). 26/131 GT item# matches but 0 prices parsed.
active_blockers.impact: Blocks pipeline accuracy. Current: 26/131 items (20% match), 0 prices. Target: 80/131 items / 61% match.

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Deprecated APIs used for field mapping (Syncfusion migrating to new API surface)
dependencies_at_risk.action_needed: Audit before next upgrade, test IDR template field mapping

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Platform channel timeout issues on some devices (GitHub issues open)

team_context.work_style: Orchestration-based (user defines plans, Claude executes with agents)
